title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label height does not change immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the UI page containing the label.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the height of the label remains unchanged.
OB: Label height does not change with label font modification. The label height remains the same even after modifying the font size.
EB: The label's height should adjust automatically when the font size is modified. The height of the label should be justified with the font size change.
SR:
